VINE VOICE
4.0 out of 5 stars Fun pattern, Long Sleeves
Reviewed in the United States 🇺🇸 on March 14, 2023
Color: Purple&white&graySize: 5-6 YearsVine Customer Review of Free Product( What's this? )
I ordered this product for my daughter and she was thrilled by the purple pattern and the large pocket in the front. The hood extended the wear time during the fall, making it just warm enough to last well into November (we live in a fairly mild climate). Since I ordered a size up for her it was large enough to likely get a second wear out of it next year. The only drawback to this jacket was that the sleeves were too long for my daughter’s arms and we had to roll up the cuff in order for her to be comfortable. Other than this, the jacket was a big hit!

Color: Purple&white&graySize: 13-14 YearsVine Customer Review of Free Product( What's this? )
This will be a nice edition to my oldest girl’s school wardrobe in a few weeks when it’s a bit cooler. I ordered the “13-14” since there wasn’t a 14-16 option. I laid it out then held it up; I could quite possibly fit it myself! It’s a bit larger than I had hoped for.. the good thing is she will be able to keep it for a while as she grows. Hoping it doesn’t swallow her. Will find out soon come Fall.
